name: websiteVersion
description: Make mutliple versions of a website available at once.
helpMarkDown: Currently only compatible with an Azure Storage Static Website
author: nventive

inputs.name: WebsitePath
inputs.label: Website location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute path of the folder where the website is located.

inputs.name: AzureSubscription
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to target for copying the files.

inputs.name: AzureStorageAccount
inputs.label: RM Storage Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Storage Account to target for copying the files.

inputs.name: VersionsFolderName
inputs.label: Versions folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the folder where to store the different versions.
